mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSG_TRACES(id, jid, message_id, status, from_jid, stamp) VALUES(#{id}, #{jid, typeHandler=JabberIdTypeHandler}, #{messageId}, #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{from, typeHandler=JabberIdTypeHandler}, #{stamp})
